hero.title: Dr. Erkinbek Dzhamanbaev
hero.specialty: Expert in Complex Comorbidities & Chronic Pain Cases
hero.headline: Beyond Standard Diagnostics: Resolving Complex Comorbidities When Tests Show 'Normal'
hero.subheadline: Specialist in complex multi-system cases, severe comorbidities, and undiagnosed conditions where conventional medicine reaches its limits. Online consultations available across Europe. 30+ years of clinical practice.

problem.title: Do these situations sound familiar?
problem.problemsTitle: When conventional medicine reaches its limits
problem.solutionsTitle: Medicine of Coherence offers a solution
problems: Multiple comorbidities — specialists treat symptoms separately
Severe cases with unclear diagnosis after years of testing
Complex multi-system dysfunction — normal tests but severe symptoms
Cases that don't fit standard diagnostic categories
solutions: Integration of evidence-based diagnosis and systemic clinical logic
70-85% symptom reduction in severe refractory cases
Restoring systemic coherence in multi-system dysfunction
problem.transition: We don't just treat symptoms. We restore your body's coherence.
